title: Wildest Time Trial Helmet Yet? Visma-Lease a Bike Unleashes Insane New Lid at Tirreno-Adriatico
content:
Jonas Vingegaard and teammates test radical new design from Giro in advance of team's Tour de France defense.

Read the full article at Wildest Time Trial Helmet Yet? Visma-Lease a Bike Unleashes Insane New Lid at Tirreno-Adriatico on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
